name: Stone-Sheathed Sword
description: Stone-Sheathed Sword is a Straight Sword in Elden Ring. It is a brand new Straight Sword in the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. The Stone-Sheathed Sword scales primarily with Strength and Dexterity and can be transformed into the Sword of Darkness or the Sword of Light. It's skill, the Square off, lets you slash upwards or thrust when attacking.

name: Star-Lined Sword
description: Star-Lined Sword is a Katana in Elden Ring. It is found in the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. The Star-Lined Sword scales primarily with Strength, Dexterity, and Intelligence and is a good Weapon for dex oriented builds. This is a weapon that causes blood loss and has a skill called Onze's Line of Stars, which lets you slash multiple times with each slash getting stronger.

name: Dragon-Hunter%27s Great Katana
description: Dragon-Hunter's Great Katana is a Great Katana in Elden Ring. It was added with the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. The Dragon-Hunter's Great Katana scales primarily with Strength and Dexterity and is a potent Weapon to oppose dragon-like creatures.

name: Barbed Staff-Spear
description: Barbed Staff-Spear is a Great Spear in Elden Ring. It is a brand-new Great Spear in the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. The Barbed Staff-Spear scales primarily with Strength, Dexterity and Faith and is a good Weapon for Faith players. This has the Jori's Inquisition skill that lets you summon golden arcs towards foes.

name: Main-gauche
description: Main-gauche is a Dagger in Elden Ring. It is found in the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. The Main-gauche scales primarily with Strength and Dexterity and is a good Weapon for performing quick slashes. This weapon comes in left-handed and allows you to stagger and land heavy hits to enemies with the Parry skill.

name: Forked-Tongue Hatchet
description: Forked-Tongue Hatchet is an Axe in Elden Ring. It was added with the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. The Forked-Tongue Hatchet scales primarily with Strength and Dexterity.

name: Smithscript Dagger
description: Smithscript Dagger is a Throwing Blade in Elden Ring. It was added with the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. The Smithscript Dagger scales primarily with Strength, Dexterity, Intelligence and Faith and is a good Weapon for players that want a ranged melee alternative without a FP cost. As a Smithscript weapon, it can be thrown and immediately returns to the user's hand. The Smithscript Dagger is one of a few non-Claw/Fist Paired Weapons.

name: Sword of Light
description: Sword of Light is a Straight Sword in Elden Ring. It is a Straight Sword introduced in the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. The Sword of Light scales primarily with Strength, Dexterity, and Faith and has a counterpart called the Sword of Darkness. Straight swords in general can be used with good speed and power. While this straight sword, comes with 93 holy damage.

name: Sword of Darkness
description: Sword of Darkness is a Straight Sword in Elden Ring. It is found in the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. The Sword of Darkness scales primarily with Strength, Dexterity, and Faith and has a counterpart called Sword of Light. This is similar to the sword of light since it also gives 93 holy damage.

name: Velvet Sword of St. Trina
description: Velvet Sword of St. Trina is a Straight Sword in Elden Ring. It is a brand new Straight Sword in the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. The Velvet Sword of St Trina scales primarily with Strength, Dexterity and Intelligence and is a good Weapon for players looking for magic damage straight sword. This also has a strong base of physical damage of 95. It produces eternal sleep build-up and a skill named Mists of Eternal Sleep that releases a cloud of purple mist when you perform a slash.

name: Leda%27s Sword
description: Leda's Sword is a Light Greatsword in Elden Ring. It is found in the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. Leda's Sword scales primarily with Strength, Dexterity and Faith. It is a good weapon for dealing piercing damage and removing buffs with its Skill.

name: Rellana%27s Twinblade
description: Rellana's Twin Blades is a Light Greatsword in Elden Ring. It is a found in the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. The Rellana's Twin Blades scales primarily with Strength, Dexterity, Intelligence and Faith and is a good Weapon for Int/Faith Builds. This weapon can be dual-wielded and comes with Fire, Physical, and Magic damage.

name: Moonrithyll%27s Knight Sword
description: Moonrithyll's Knight Sword is a Colossal Sword in Elden Ring. It was added with the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. The Moonrithyll's Knight Sword scales primarily with Strength, Dexterity and Intelligence and is a good Weapon for Strength/Intelligence Builds. This comes with the Tremendous Phalanx skill, which lets you summon magic blades that head towards enemies around you.

name: Sword of Night
description: Sword of Night is a Katana in Elden Ring. It is a brand new Katana in the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. The Sword of Night scales  with Dexterity and is a good Weapon for DEX Builds. This comes with the skill, Witching Hour Slash which is an unblockable slash attack that infuses the dark of night on the blade.

name: Spirit Sword
description: Spirit Sword is a Curved Sword in Elden Ring. It is a brand new Curved Sword in the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. The Spirit Sword scales primarily with Strength, Dexterity, and Intelligence and is a good Weapon for INT characters in the look for a sword. This weapon comes with the Rancor Slash skill which lets you summon spirits towards enemies.

name: Horned Warrior%27s Sword
description: Horned Warrior's Sword is a Curved Sword in Elden Ring. It is a brand new Curved Sword in the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. The Horned Warrior's Sword scales primarily with Strength and Dexterity and is a good Weapon for players who like paired weapons or Curved Swords but don't want to farm two. This comes with the Horn Calling skill which lets you do a ground slam with the weapon, letting multiple horns come out of the ground under an enemy.

name: Curseblade%27s Cirque
description: Curseblade's Cirque is a Backhand Blade in Elden Ring. It is found in the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. The Curseblade's Cirque scales primarily with Strength and Dexterity and is a good Weapon for builds that like rapid attacks and paired weapons with native Bleed build up.

name: Falx
description: Falx is a Curved Sword in Elden Ring. It is found in the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. The Falx scales with Strength and Dexterity. This comes with the Revenger's Blade skill which lets you dash up to an enemy and slash them open with the blades held in each hand and has tremendous bleed build-up.

name: Carian Sorcery Sword
description: Carian Sorcery Sword is a Thrusting Sword in Elden Ring. It was added with the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. The Carian Sorcery Sword scales primarily with Strength, Dexterity and Intelligence and is a good Weapon for players looking for a weapon that can also serve as a catalyst for spells.

name: Euporia
description: Euporia is a Twinblade in Elden Ring. It is a brand new Twinblade in the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. The Euporia scales primarily with Strength, Dexterity and Faith and is a good Weapon for Faith players looking for a twinblade. One of its unique features is its ability to powerup the weapon skill when attacking enemies.

name: Backhand Blade
description: Backhand Blade is a Backhand Blade in Elden Ring. It is found in the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. The Backhand Blade scales primarily with Strength and Dexterity and is a good paired Weapon for agile builds that prefer DEX as it has S scaling in DEX at max upgrade with the Keen affinity

name: Lizard Greatsword
description: Lizard Greatsword is a Greatsword in Elden Ring. It was added with the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. The Lizard Greatsword scales primarily with Strength and Dexterity and is a good Weapon for balanced builds that look to have an impish look. This weapon can launch a projectile when you use its heavy attack and has the Stamp Skill that can shortly prevent you from being staggered.

name: Greatsword of Solitude
description: Greatsword of Solitude is a Greatsword in Elden Ring. It is a brand new Greatsword in the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. The Greatsword of Solitude scales primarily with Strength and Dexterity and is a good Weapon for pure Strength Builds. It's weapon skill, the Solitary Moon Slash, lets you summon light that can damage your enemies.

name: Greatsword of Damnation
description: Greatsword of Damnation is a Greatsword in Elden Ring. It was added with the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. The Greatsword of Damnation scales primarily with Strength, Dexterity and Faith and is a good Weapon for for Faith players that are looking for a Greatsword. This weapon has high physical and holy damage and comes with the Golden Crux that allows you to do a leaping attack.

name: Ancient Meteoric Ore Greatsword
description: Ancient Meteoric Ore Greatsword is a Colossal Sword in Elden Ring. It was added with the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. The Ancient Meteoric Ore Greatsword scales primarily with Strength, Dexterity and Arcane and is a good Weapon for Arcane players that want to use a humongous weapon. This greatsword has high physical damage and does a decent amount of magic damage. It comes with the White Light Charge skill that lets you charge foes and blast them with light magic.

name: Greatsword of Radahn (Lord)
description: Greatsword of Radahn (Lord) is a Colossal Sword in Elden Ring. It is a brand new Colossal Sword in the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. The Greatsword of Radahn (Lord) scales primarily with Strength, Dexterity, and Intelligence and is one of the options players can select when trading the Remembrance of a God and a Lord.

name: Greatsword of Radahn (Light)
description: Greatsword of Radahn (Light) is a Colossal Sword in Elden Ring. It is a brand new Colossal Sword in the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. The Greatsword of Radahn (Light) scales primarily with Strength, Dexterity and Intelligence and can be obtained by trading the Remembrance of a God and a Lord at the Roundtable Hold.

name: Queelign%27s Greatsword
description: Queelign's Greatsword is a Heavy Thrusting Sword in Elden Ring. It is a brand new Heavy Thrusting Sword in the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. The Queelign's Greatsword scales primarily with Strength, Dexterity and Faith and is the Weapon wielded by Fire Knight Queelign.

name: Horned Warrior%27s Greatsword
description: Horned Warrior's Greatsword is a Curved Greatsword in Elden Ring. It was added with the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. The Horned Warrior's Greatsword scales primarily with Strength, Dexterity and Faith and is a good Weapon for Builds that use Strength and Faith. This comes with the Horn Calling skill which lets you do a ground slam with the weapon, letting multiple horns come out of the ground under an enemy.

name: Rakshasa%27s Great Katana
description: Rakshasa's Great Katana is a Great Katana in Elden Ring. It is found in the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. The Rakshasa's Great Katana scales primarily with Strength and Dexterity and is a good Weapon for STR/DEX builds. This weapon has blood-loss buildup and reduces your chances of getting staggered during attacks.

name: Dancing Blade of Ranah
description: Dancing Blade of Ranah is a paired Curved Sword in Elden Ring. It is a brand new Curved Sword in the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. The Dancing Blade of Ranah scales primarily with Dexterity and is a good Weapon for Dexterity Builds that attack rapidly. This weapon comes with the Unending Dance Skill which lets you slash repeatedly until you drain your stamina.

name: Milady
description: Milady is a Light Greatsword in Elden Ring. It is a found in the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. The Milady scales primarily with Strength and Dexterity and is a good Weapon for chaining together light and heavy attacks as well as having a large variety of Ashes of War.

name: Death Knight%27s Twin Axes
description: Death Knight's Twin Axes is an Axe in Elden Ring. It was added with the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. The Death Knight's Twin Axes scales primarily with Strength, Dexterity and Faith and is a good Weapon for faith builds. This comes with the Blinkbolt: Twinaxe skill, which transforms you into a bolt of lightning.

name: Death Knight%27s Longhaft Axe
description: Death Knight's Longhaft Axe is a Greataxe in Elden Ring. It is a brand new Greataxe in the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. The Death Knight's Longhaft Axe scales primarily with Strength, Dexterity and Faith and is a good Weapon for faith players looking for a great axe. This weapon deals both physical and lightning damage and comes with the Blinkbolt: Long-hafted Axe skill that transforms you into a bolt of lightning that rushes down to enemies and follows up with a heavy attack.

name: Putrescence Cleaver
description: Putrescence Cleaver is a Greataxe in Elden Ring. It is a brand new Greataxe in the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. The Putrescence Cleaver scales primarily with Strength, Dexterity and Arcane and is a good Weapon for inflicting Frostbite. This weapon causes frost to build up which gains power from you arcane stat. It also comes with the Spinning Guillotine skill that lets you ground slam the blade, followed up by spinning slashes.

name: Flowerstone Gavel
description: Flowerstone Gavel is a Hammer in Elden Ring. It was added with the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. The Flowerstone Gavel scales primarily with Strength, Dexterity and Arcane and can be obtained from completing the Dragon Communion Priestess questline.

name: Black Steel Greathammer
description: Black Steel Greathammer is a Great Hammer in Elden Ring. It was added with the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. The Black Steel Greathammer scales primarily with Strength, Dexterity and Faith and is a good Weapon for Faith builds that are looking for a massive weapon that also scales with Strength and Dexterity.

name: Smithscript Greathammer
description: Smithscript Greathammer is a Great Hammer in Elden Ring. It was added with the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. The Smithscript Greathammer scales primarily with Strength, Dexterity, Intelligence and Faith and is a good Weapon for players looking for a heavy ranged melee alternative without a FP cost. As a Smithscript weapon, it can be thrown and immediately returns to the user's hand.

name: Anvil Hammer
description: Anvil Hammer is a Colossal Weapon in Elden Ring. It is a brand new Colossal Weapon in the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. The Anvil Hammer scales primarily with Strength, Dexterity,  Intelligence and Faith and is a good Weapon for Strength or multi-attribute Builds. This weapon comes with the Smithing Art Spears skill which lets you smash the ground very hard and summons multiple spears from the ground.

name: Devonia%27s Hammer
description: Devonia's Hammer is a Colossal Weapon in Elden Ring. It is a Colossal Weapon introduced in the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. The Devonia's Hammer scales primarily with Strength, Dexterity, and Faith and is a good Weapon for STR/FAI builds. It draws from the power of the Crucible.

name: Serpent Flail
description: Serpent Flail is a Flail in Elden Ring. It was added with the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. The Serpent Flail scales primarily with Strength, Dexterity, and Faith and is a good Weapon for dealing highs amounts of Fire Damage for a cheap cost and for Faith builds.

name: Swift Spear
description: Swift Spear is a Spear in Elden Ring. It is a brand new Spear in the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. The Swift Spear scales primarily with Strength and Dexterity and is a good Weapon for builds that like to attack rapidly with decent range. This weapon is good for its high attack speed and can be paired with a shield. This also comes with the Impaling Thrust which goes through an enemy guarding.

name: Smithscript Spear
description: Smithscript Spear is a Spear in Elden Ring. It was added with the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. The Smithscript Spear scales primarily with Strength, Dexterity, Intelligence and Faith and is a good Weapon for players that want a ranged melee alternative without a FP cost. As a Smithscript weapon, it can be thrown and immediately returns to the user's hand.

name: Bloodfiend%27s Sacred Spear
description: Bloodfiend's Sacred Spear is a Great Spear in Elden Ring. It is a brand new Great Spear in the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. The Bloodfiend's Sacred Spear scales primarily with Strength, Dexterity and Arcane and is a good Weapon for Arcane builds. This weapon causes blood-loss build-up and comes with the Bloodfiend's Bloodboon skill that lets you summon blood flames to your enemy.

name: Spear of the Impaler
description: Spear of the Impaler is a Great Spear in Elden Ring. It was added with the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. The Spear of the Impaler scales primarily with Strength, Dexterity, and Faith and is the legendary spear wielded by Messmer the Impaler. This comes with the Messmer's Assault skill that lets you do a combo of attacks and eventually slamming the spear that causes a wide area of damage.

name: Spirit Glaive
description: Spirit Glaive is a Halberd in Elden Ring. It is a brand-new Halberd in the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. The Spirit Glaive scales primarily with Strength, Dexterity, and Intelligence and is a good Weapon for INT players, and is related to the Spirit Sword, sharing the same Skill, which is the Rancor Slash.

name: Poleblade of the Bud
description: Poleblade of the Bud is a Halberd in Elden Ring. It is a brand-new Halberd in the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. The Poleblade of the Bud scales primarily with Strength, Dexterity and Arcane and is the weapon wielded by Romina, Saint of the Bud. This causes scarlet rot buildup and has the skill called Romina's Purification which lets you do sweep attacks that have Scarlet Rot.

name: Obsidian Lamina
description: Obsidian Lamina is a Reaper in Elden Ring. It was added with the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. The Obsidian Lamina scales primarily with Strength, Dexterity and Arcane and is a good Weapon for bleed builds. It can be obtained after completing Sir Ansbach's questline by aiding him.

name: Tooth Whip
description: Tooth Whip is a Whip in Elden Ring. It is a brand-new Whip in the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. The Tooth Whip scales primarily with Strength and Dexterity and is a good Weapon for players looking for a Poison whip. This applies posionbuildup and comes with the painful strike skill.

name: Poisoned Hand
description: Poisoned Hand is a Fist in Elden Ring. It was added with the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. The Poisoned Hand scales primarily with Strength and Arcane and is a good Weapon for inflicting Poison.

name: Madding Hand
description: Madding Hand is a Fist in Elden Ring. It was added with the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. The Madding Hand scales primarily with Strength, Dexterity, Intelligence, and Faith and is a good Weapon for inflicting Madness.

name: Thiollier%27s Hidden Needle
description: Thiollier's Hidden Needle is a Fist in Elden Ring. It is a brand-new Fist in the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. The Thiollier's Hidden Needle scales primarily with Strength, Dexterity and Intelligence and is a good Weapon for players that want to use a weapon capable of inflicting Sleep.

name: Golem Fist
description: Golem Fist is a Fist in Elden Ring. It was added with the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. The Golem Fist scales primarily with Strength, Dexterity, Intelligence and Faith and is a good Weapon for players that want a ranged melee alternative without a FP cost. As a Smithscript weapon, it can be thrown and immediately returns to the user's hand.

name: Dryleaf Arts
description: Dryleaf Arts is a Hand-to-Hand Art in Elden Ring. It is an armament introduced in the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. The Dryleaf Arts scales primarily with Strength and Dexterity and is a good Weapon for those looking for rapid attacks with long combos.

name: Dane%27s Footwork
description: Dane's Footwork is a Hand-to-Hand Art in Elden Ring. It is an armament introduced in the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. The Dane's Footwork scales primarily with Strength and Dexterity and is a good Weapon for players that want to experience this new weapon type.

name: Claws of Night
description: Claws of Night is a Claw in Elden Ring. It was added with the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. The Claws of Night only scales with Dexterity and is therefore a good Weapon for dexterity builds. As a Smithscript weapon, the claws can be thrown and immediately returns to the user's hand.

name: Beast Claw
description: Beast Claw is an Incantation in Elden Ring. Beast Claw spell conjures five offensive vertical waves that travel forward dealing damage. Updated to Patch 1.07.

name: Red Bear%27s Claw
description: Red Bear's Claw is a Beast Claw in Elden Ring. It was added with the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. The Red Bear's Claw scales primarily with Strength and Dexterity and is a good Weapon that deals damage fast and inflicts Hemorrhage.

name: Bone Bow
description: Bone Bow is a Light Bow in Elden Ring. It was added with the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. The Bone Bow scales primarily with Strength and Dexterity and is a good Weapon for setting status effects and enemies who input read projectiles. This is a fast weapon that comes with the Rancor Shot skill that lets you engulf your arrows with spirits that go for an enemy. All Light Bows require Arrows to fire.

name: Ansbach%27s Longbow
description: Ansbach's Longbow is a Bow in Elden Ring. It was added with the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. The Ansbach's Longbow scales primarily with Strength and Dexterity and is wielded by Sir Ansbach. All Bows require Arrows to fire.

name: Repeating Crossbow
description: Repeating Crossbow is a Crossbow in Elden Ring. It is found in the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. The Repeating Crossbow scales primarily with Strength and is a good Weapon that inflicts ranged damage and solid barrage of shots. It is the only crossbow with a unique skill. All Crossbows require Bolts to fire.

name: Spread Crossbow
description: Spread Crossbow is a Crossbow in Elden Ring. It is a brand-new Crossbow in the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. The Spread Crossbow does not scale with any stat attributes, but requires Strength and Dexterity. It is a good Weapon for dealing with groups of enemies. All Crossbows require Bolts to fire.

name: Igon%27s Greatbow
description: Igon's Greatbow is a Greatbow in Elden Ring. It is found in the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. Igon's Greatbow scales primarily with Strength and is specifically made for hunting dragons. Despite the mobility flaw, the heavy damage dealt when using great arrows makes up for it. All Greatbows require Great Arrows to fire.

name: Smithscript Shield
description: Smithscript Shield is a Small Shield in Elden Ring. It is a brand new Small Shield in the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. The Smithscript Shield is a Shield that scales primarily with Strength,  Intelligence and Faith. Small Shields usually weigh very little and has the least form of protection from attacks. They are often used by players who prefer Parrying rather than Blocking. Its lighter weight also makes it ideal for quick, agile characters with low equipment weight capacity.

name: Shield of Night
description: Shield of Night is a Small Shield in Elden Ring. It was added with the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. The Shield of Night is a Shield that scales primarily with Dexterity. Small Shields usually weigh very little and has the least form of protection from attacks. They are often used by players who prefer Parrying rather than Blocking. Its lighter weight also makes it ideal for quick, agile characters with low equipment weight capacity.

name: Golden Lion Shield
description: Golden Lion Shield is a Medium Shield in Elden Ring. It was added with the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. The Golden Lion Shield is a Shield that scales primarily with Strength. Medium Shields feature a good balance between defense and weight, which is great for most situations in combat. Although it may not be as light as a Small Shield which is good for agility and parrying, the Standard Shield works best at reducing damage and blocking.

name: Verdigris Greatshield
description: Verdigris Greatshield is a Greatshield in Elden Ring. It is a brand new Greatshield in the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. The Verdigris Greatshield is a Shield that scales primarily with Strength. Greatshields weigh a decent amount and provide the best protection in the game. Greatshields provide a greater value of blocking and protecting oneself from enemy and boss attacks but greatly increases the weight and reduces the player's mobility. This type of shield works best at reducing damage or guarding instead of parrying.

name: Dueling Shield
description: Dueling Shield is a Thrusting Shield in Elden Ring. It was added with the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. The Dueling Shield scales primarily with Strength and Dexterity and is a good Weapon for experiencing the new weapon type added with Shadow of the Erdtree. It has high guard boost, allowing good stamina management when blocking attacks. The shield also has resistances to both physical and elemental damage types, making it a good almost all-around choice.

name: Carian Thrusting Shield
description: Carian Thrusting Shield is a Thrusting Shield in Elden Ring. It was added with the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. The Carian Thrusting Shield scales primarily with Strength, Dexterity and Intelligence and is a good Weapon for players that want to experience the new weapon type added with Shadow of the Erdtree. It gives a high guard boost for good stamina management while blocking and provides resistances to physical and magical damage.

name: Bloodfiend%27s Arm
description: Bloodfiend's Arm is a Colossal Weapon in Elden Ring. It was added with the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. The Bloodfiend's Arm scales primarily with Strength, Dexterity and Arcane and is a good Weapon for Bleed and Arcane Builds. This is a slow but hard-hitting weapon that sprays blood when using the heavy attacks.

name: Shadow Sunflower Blossom
description: Shadow Sunflower Blossom is a Colossal Weapon in Elden Ring. It is a brand new Colossal Weapon in the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. The Shadow Sunflower Blossom scales primarily with Strength, Dexterity and Faith and it can be obtained after trading the Remembrance of the Shadow Sunflower.

name: Gazing Finger
description: Gazing Finger is a Colossal Weapon in Elden Ring. It is a brand new Colossal Weapon in the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. The Gazing Finger scales primarily with Strength, Intelligence and Faith and can be obtained after trading the Remembrance of the Mother of Fingers at the Roundtable Hold. This has the Kowtower's Resentment skill that lets you slam the weapon down and causes a holy explosion.

name: Nanaya%27s Torch
description: Nanaya's Torch is a Torch in Elden Ring. It is found in the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC next to Nanaya's corpse. The Nanaya's Torch scales primarily with Strength, Dexterity, Intelligence and Faith and is a good Weapon for all-around builds.

name: Lamenting Visage
description: Lamenting Visage is a Torch in Elden Ring. It is found in the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. The Lamenting Visage scales primarily with Strength and is a good Weapon for sneaking in the Abyssal Woods or from the basilisk eyes in Scorpion River Catacombs.

name: Deadly Poison Perfume Bottle
description: Deadly Poison Perfume Bottle is a Perfume Bottle in Elden Ring. It is found in the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. The Deadly Poison Perfume Bottle scales primarily with Strength, Dexterity and Arcane and is a good backup Weapon for arcane builds. This weapon causes poison buildup and causes a mist of poison to spread out using the weapon skill.

name: Chilling Perfume Bottle
description: Chilling Perfume Bottle is a Perfume Bottle in Elden Ring. It is a brand new Perfume Bottle in the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. The Chilling Perfume Bottle scales primarily with Strength, Dexterity and Intelligence and is a good Weapon for DEX/INT builds and deals Frostbite. This weapon produces frost buildup and is capable of releasing blasts of ice over a wide area.

name: Firespark Perfume Bottle
description: Firespark Perfume Bottle is a Perfume Bottle in Elden Ring. It is found in the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. The Firespark Perfume Bottle scales exclusively with Dexterity and is a good Weapon for high Fire Damage and pure DEX Builds. This weapon produces explosions while in the air that spread in a wide area.

name: Frenzyflame Perfume Bottle
description: Frenzyflame Perfume Bottle is a Perfume Bottle in Elden Ring. It is found in the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. The Frenzyflame Perfume Bottle scales primarily with Strength, Dexterity, Intelligence and Faith and is a good Weapon for inflicting Madness status effect on all enemies within its radius.

name: Lightning Perfume Bottle
description: Lightning Perfume Bottle is a Perfume Bottle in Elden Ring. It is found in the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. The Lightning Perfume Bottle scales primarily with Dexterity and Faith and is a good Weapon for Lightning and Dexterity/Faith Builds. This weapon can release a barrage of lightning over a wide area.

name: Dryleaf Seal
description: Dryleaf Seal is a Sacred Seal in Elden Ring. It is found in the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. The Dryleaf Seal scales primarily with Strength and Faith and is a good Weapon for Faith casters wanting to use rings of light incantations and benefit from its powerful scaling.

name: Fire Knight%27s Seal
description: Fire Knight's Seal is a Sacred Seal in Elden Ring. It is a brand new Sacred Seal in the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. The Fire Knight's Seal scales primarily with Strength and Faith and is a good Weapon for Builds centered around the new Messmer Fire Incantations.

name: Spiraltree Seal
description: Spiraltree Seal is a Sacred Seal in Elden Ring. It is found in the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. The Spiraltree Seal scales primarily with Strength and Faith and is a good Weapon for Builds centered around Spiral Incantations.

name: Fire Knight%27s Shortsword
description: Fire Knight's Shortsword is a Dagger in Elden Ring. It is a brand new Dagger in the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. The Fire Knight's Shortsword scales primarily with Strength, Dexterity and Faith and is a good Weapon for Fire-based builds. This can be dropped by the Fire Knights and comes with the Quickstep skill.

name: Fire Knight%27s Greatsword
description: Fire Knight's Greatsword is a Colossal Sword in Elden Ring. It is a Colossal Sword introduced in the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. The Fire Knight's Greatsword scales primarily with Strength, Dexterity and Faith and is a good Weapon for fire builds. This weapon has the Stamp Skill, which prevents you in a short time from being staggered.

name: Messmer Soldier%27s Spear
description: Messmer Soldier's Spear is a Great Spear in Elden Ring. It is a brand new Great Spear in the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. The Messmer Soldier's Spear scales primarily with Strength and Dexterity and is a well-balanced Weapon. This weapon can be used while guarding with a shield and has the thrust skill that goes through an enemy.

name: Messmer Soldier%27s Axe
description: Messmer Soldier's Axe is an Axe in Elden Ring. It is a brand new Axe in the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. The Messmer Soldier's Axe scales primarily with Strength and Dexterity and is a good Weapon for Builds that like to use Charged Heavy Attacks. It's weapon skill, War Cry, lets you increase attack power and lets you charge the enemy with heavy attacks.

name: Bloodfiend%27s Fork
description: Bloodfiend's Fork is a Spear in Elden Ring. It is a brand new Spear in the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. The Bloodfiend's Fork scales primarily with Strength, Dexterity and Arcane and is a good Weapon for Bleed and Arcane Builds. This weapon causes blood loss build-up and can increase attack power by using the Barbaric Roar skill along with a combo.

name: Smithscript Axe
description: Smithscript Axe is an Axe in Elden Ring. It was added with the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. The Smithscript Axe scales primarily with Strength, Dexterity, Intelligence and Faith and is a good Weapon for players that want a ranged melee alternative without a FP cost. As a Smithscript weapon, it can be thrown and immediately returns to the user's hand.

name: Freyja%27s Greatsword
description: Freyja's Greatsword is a Curved Greatsword in Elden Ring. It is a brand new Curved Greatsword in the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. Freyja's Greatsword scales primarily with Strength and Dexterity and is the powerful Weapon wielded by Redmane Freyja. This comes with the Spinning Slash skill which is the favorite skill of dexterous warriors that lets you slash foes as your body spins. This momentum can connect into a final heavy attack.

name: Sword Lance
description: Sword Lance is a Heavy Thrusting Sword in Elden Ring. It is a brand new Heavy Thrusting Sword in the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. The Sword Lance scales primarily with Strength and Dexterity and is available after trading  the Remembrance of the Wild Boar Rider with Enia at the Roundtable Hold. This weapon comes with the Spinning Gravity Thrust which lets you levitate and thrust towards an enemy while spinning.

name: Staff of the Great Beyond
description: Staff of the Great Beyond is a Glintstone Staff in Elden Ring. It was added the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. The Staff of the Great Beyond scales primarily with Intelligence and Faith and is a good Weapon for full-spellcasters, allowing to cast both Sorceries and Incantations.
